---
title: "package.json"
---

## High-level description
This is the `package.json` file for the `end-of-stream` npm package. It defines the package's metadata, dependencies, and scripts. The package provides functionality to call a callback when a readable, writable, or duplex stream has completed or failed.

## Symbols

### Package Metadata
#### Description
Defines essential information about the package.

| Field | Value | Description |
|:------|:------|:------------|
| name | "end-of-stream" | The name of the package |
| version | "1.4.4" | The current version of the package |
| description | "Call a callback when a readable/writable/duplex stream has completed or failed." | Brief description of the package's functionality |
| main | "index.js" | The main entry point of the package |
| author | "Mathias Buus &lt;mathiasbuus@gmail.com&gt;" | The author of the package |
| license | "MIT" | The license under which the package is distributed |

### Dependencies
#### Description
Lists the runtime dependencies of the package.

| Dependency | Version |
|:-----------|:--------|
| once | "^1.4.0" |

### DevDependencies
#### Description
Lists the development dependencies of the package.

| Dependency | Version |
|:-----------|:--------|
| tape | "^4.11.0" |

### Scripts
#### Description
Defines npm scripts for the package.

| Script | Command |
|:-------|:--------|
| test | "node test.js" |

### Repository
#### Description
Specifies the type and URL of the package's repository.

| Field | Value |
|:------|:------|
| type | "git" |
| url | "git://github.com/mafintosh/end-of-stream.git" |

### Files
#### Description
Lists the files to be included when the package is published.

| Files |
|:------|
| "index.js" |

### Keywords
#### Description
Provides keywords to improve the discoverability of the package.

Keywords: "stream", "streams", "callback", "finish", "close", "end", "wait"

### Bugs
#### Description
Specifies the URL for reporting issues with the package.

| Field | Value |
|:------|:------|
| url | "https://github.com/mafintosh/end-of-stream/issues" |

### Homepage
#### Description
Provides the URL for the package's homepage.

Homepage: "https://github.com/mafintosh/end-of-stream"

## Dependencies
| Dependency | Purpose |
|:-----------|:--------|
| once | Ensures a function is only called once |
| tape | Used for testing (dev dependency) |

This `package.json` file provides all the necessary metadata and configuration for the `end-of-stream` npm package. It specifies the package version, description, entry point, dependencies, scripts, and other relevant information for both users and npm to understand and use the package correctly.
